<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.34
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Permanent employment agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Between
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WEIGHT WATCHERS FRANCE whose registered office is located Immeuble &laquo;&nbsp;Le Floril&egrave;ge&nbsp;&raquo; 4 all&eacute;e de la Fresnerie 78330
	FONTENAY LE FLEURY, represented by Mr.&nbsp;Clive BROTHERS, acting in his capacity as Managing Director, below called &#147;the Company&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ON THE ONE HAND
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	And
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Domiciled
	at [REDACTED]
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ON THE OTHER HAND
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	The parties hereto agree as follow:
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	EMPLOYER:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company may be substituted at any time to any company belonging to the group for the fulfillment of its contractual obligations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	HIRE:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	From the 13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;October 2003 and subject to the pre-medical examination, the
	Company hires Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET according to the conditions stated below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company is subject to the
	provisions of the staff regulations and collective agreement existing since the 23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	rd
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;May 2003. Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will benefit from the collective agreement applicable to the Company or to any company where Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET would be transferred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET who accepts to be hired by the Company, formally declares not to be bound by any other company and being
	free from any commitments regarding her last employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	She commits to inform without delay the Company about any changes in her personal
	situation such as her address, her family statute, etc&#133;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	PROFESSIONAL ROLE:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will be:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	From the
	13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;October 2003 to the 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;December 2003:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	FUTURE MANAGING DIRECTOR
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	FROM the
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;January 2004:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	MANAGING DIRECTOR
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Her
	functions will be as follow (see the definition attached).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The work will be executed by Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET under the
	authority and within instructions given by her supervisor, Mr.&nbsp;Clive BROTHERS, or other person designated by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	CLASSIFICATION:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET is a senior executive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">

</P>
<A NAME="eolPage125"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	SALARY:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will be paid 120&nbsp;000 &#128; as gross salary over thirteen months. The monthly gross salary will then be 9 230, 77 &#128; x 13.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As regard to the global economic situation of the Company, to its own results and also to the personal achievement of
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET, the salary of the latter will be reconsidered on the 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	of July 2004 and every year upon mutual agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This annual negotiation will take place
	regardless any legal or treaty provision applicable to the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	WORK DURATION:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As a senior executive, and with regard to the specific organization of the Company applicable to the employees, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will
	not be bound by the schedule applicable in the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	AWARD &#150; BONUS:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will receive a bonus compliant with the rule in place in the Company applying to the Country
	Managers of Weight Watchers Group. From the
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;January to 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;December 2004 a bonus of 60&nbsp;000 &#128; is guaranteed to
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET. For the first year, she will receive the highest value between this minimum and the result of the calculation of the above mentioned rule in place.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	WORKING PLACE:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will work at the Company
	headquarters, in Fontenay le Fleury or any place chosen by the Company in Ile-de-France.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	TRAVEL AND EXPENSE REIMBURSEMENT:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Because of her duties, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET may have to travel in France or outside, short or long term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will be reimbursed of travelling and subsistence expenses upon receipt.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	PROVISION OF A COMPANY CAR:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	With regard to her duties, the Company will provide Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET a Company car which will remain its property. That provision will be effective the following month after her arrival
	and will remain for the length of the agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The car can be used for a personal and professional purpose. The Company will cover all
	expenses related to the car upon receipt. This provision is a benefit in kind regarding tax and social rules.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The insurance will be paid by
	the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to inform the Company of any damages on the car within 48 hours maximum. The Company
	will then take the necessary measures.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to keep the car in perfect conditions. Once the agreement
	is terminated, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to give the car, papers and keys back immediately at the office.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne
	POLLIER-BOUSQUET will be personally responsible for any parking or traffic fine. She will then pay in due time. Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to inform the Company of any temporary or permanent withdrawal of license, of any fine she
	would not have yet received the offence notification, in particular if she has to go to court because of the offence (speeding for example). Once the agreement is terminated, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to pay the whole fines that
	could be claimed before or after termination of the agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET does not comply with these rules, it
	could be qualified as a fault justifying the car collection.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	PAID LEAVES:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will benefit of 2,5 days each working month and the French bank holidays. The period of vacation will be decided by
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET and her supervisor considering the needs of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No leave carryover will be allowed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	OBLIGATIONS:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to respect the instructions and the rules in place in the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	TRIAL PERIOD:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A three-month trial period will apply. Both parties will have the
	opportunity to terminate the agreement, without indemnity. The party who does not wish to continue the contract must inform the other party in writing at least 8 days before the desired departure date. This notice may be notified until the last day
	of the trial period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any interruption occurring during the trial period (illness, holidays) will extend the length of that period as it has
	to be effective work.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In case of extension of the trial period which cannot exceed three months, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will be
	notified of this extension eight days before the end of the termination of the first trial period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	During that extension, the trial can be
	interrupted by either party, within a prior notice of fifteen days. This notice can be notified within the last day of the extension.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	DURATION &#150; PRIOR NOTICE:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The agreement is permanent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	At the end of the
	trial period, both parties can terminate the agreement. This is subject to the respect of the laws in force and after a three month prior notice. No prior notice will be applicable in case of serious or gross misconduct.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	EXCLUSIVITY:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	During the
	agreement Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to exclusively work for the Company. No other professional activity is allowed, even noncompetitive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits not to have any direct or indirect act of unfair competition during the agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	PUBLISHING:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits not to publish any studies
	based on works done for the Company or its clients. She also commits not to disclose any information, results of the clients, etc without the prior consent of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	PROFESSIONAL CONFIDENTIALITY:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	During the agreement and after its termination, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits not to disclose to any company or person any confidential information that could foster competitors. She commits
	to keep secret any information regarding the finance of the Company or the Company itself and any company belonging to the same Group or their clients.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to keep secret all the information she will gather in the frame of her duties or because of the time she will spend in the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any failure to this obligation would be seen as a serious misconduct justifying a redundancy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	RESTITUTION AND USE OF THE COMPANY ASSETS:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any assets of the Company that
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET would have been entrusted with in her duties notably the files, documentation, correspondence, books, keys, credit cards, vehicle registration, check books, cell phone and other documents remain the Company&#146;s
	property and will have to be returned.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET will use them solely for a work purpose. She will not make any copy
	of them without the express consent of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits to return the so-called assets and any copy in
	her possession the day of her departure from the Company for any cause. She will do it by herself without any prior or formal notice from the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	NON-COMPETE OBLIGATION:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For any reason of termination of the agreement,
	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET commits not to work for any competing firm or to have any interest at any manufacturing and trading of products or services that could compete the activities of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This clause applies to any sort of termination of contract intervened as soon as the trial period will be
	finished.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	By violating this clause, Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne POLLIER-BOUSQUET would have to pay a fine of 183 &#128; to the Company. This amount
	will have to be paid for each established breach without any prior notice to cease the prohibited activity. The allocation of the fine does not waive the right of the Company to order under financial compulsion the cessation of the competing
	activity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	GOVERNING LAW &#150; JURISDICTION:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The agreement is governed by French law. All disputes in connection with this agreement shall be addressed to the French courts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Done in two original documents
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In Fontenay le Fleury,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	of October 2003
</FONT>
</P>

</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<U>
	BY AND BETWEEN THE UNDERSIGNED:
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	The company W
<SMALL>
	EIGHT
</SMALL>

<SMALL>
	ATCHERS
</SMALL>

<SMALL>
	RANCE
</SMALL>
	,
</B>
	a French
<I>
	&#147;soci&eacute;t&eacute; &agrave; responsabilit&eacute; limit&eacute;e&#148;
</I>
	, the registered
	office of which is located at 7 boulevard des Ch&ecirc;nes &#150; parc Ariane &#150; B&acirc;timent Mars &#150; 78280 Guyancourt, registered with the business and trade register of Versailles under number 722&nbsp;063&nbsp;427 00503, and duly
	represented by
<B>
<I>
	Nicholas Hotchkin
</I>
</B>
	in his capacity as Director of Weight Watchers France.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Hereinafter referred to as the
<I>
	&#147;
</I>
<B>

	Company
</I>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	ON ONE HAND,
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	Mrs.&nbsp;Corinne Pollier-Bousquet, a French citizen, residing [REDACTED], and
	registered with the social security bodies under number [REDACTED].
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Hereinafter referred to as the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Employee

	&#148;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ON THE OTHER HAND,
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Together
	hereinafter referred to as the &laquo;&nbsp;
<B>
<I>
	Parties
</I>

	&nbsp;&raquo;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	I
<SMALL>
	T
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	HAS
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	BEEN
</SMALL>

	AGREED
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	AS
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	FOLLOWS
</SMALL>
</U>
<SMALL>
</SMALL>
	:
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The present addendum amends the provisions of the
	Employee&#146;s employment contract dated 6&nbsp;October 2003 with the same object as follows, the remaining terms and conditions of the initial employment contract remaining unchanged and in force:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	J
<SMALL>
	OB
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	TITLE
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	According to her initial employment contract dated 6&nbsp;October 2003, the Employee held the position of Managing Director.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As per the present addendum, the Parties agreed that as from 1&nbsp;May 2013, the Employee shall perform the duties of
<I>
	&#147;President &#150;
	Continental Europe&#148;
</I>
	, thus triggering the termination of her functions as Managing Director as from this date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For the execution of
	her new duties, the Employee will report to James Chambers in his capacity as Chief Executive Officer of Weight Watchers International, Inc, or any other person that may be substituted by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	D
<SMALL>
	UTIES
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	AND
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	RESPONSIBILITIES
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the frame of her functions as President Continental Europe, the Employee will mainly be in charge of the following duties : Management of the continental European operational business including
	(i)&nbsp;contribution to the definition of the strategy of the Continental Europe and developing such strategy, (ii)&nbsp;day to day supervision of each country General Manager in the Continental European countries zone as necessary together with
	the supervision of the General Manager of Australia; (iii)&nbsp;defining the means and resources necessary for the development of the turnover, (iv)&nbsp;ensuring clients satisfaction through the respect of the contractual commitments,
	(v)&nbsp;managing and leading the teams under her responsibility and (vi)&nbsp;defining and implementing operational procedures (vii)&nbsp;contribution to international strategy beyond Continental Europe.
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	These duties and responsibilities may be modified or changed in order to use in the best way the skills and
	abilities of the Employee in light of the Company&#146;s needs and organizational and adaptability objectives.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<SMALL>
	WORKING
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	TIME
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the framework of her duties as
<I>
	&#147; President &#150; Continental Europe&#148;
</I>
	, the Employee has a high degree of accountability and benefits
	from a large autonomy in the performance of her work and in the organisation of her schedule. In addition, she is duly empowered to take decisions involving the Company and classified in the highest level in the Company. Thus, the Employee is
	involved in the Company executive management.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As a result, the Employee belongs to the category of senior executive status (
<I>
	&#147;cadres
	dirigeants&#148;
</I>
	) with the meaning set out in article&nbsp;L. 3111-2 of the French Labour Code. Thus, the Employee is not subject to the provisions of the French Labour Code related to the duration of work, daily rest, bank holidays and the day
	of solidarity (
<I>
	&#147;journ&eacute;e de solidarit&eacute;&#148;
</I>
	).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Employee benefits however from provisions of the French labour
	Code regarding paid vacations as well as the time saving account as the case may be.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<SMALL>
	PLACE
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	OF
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	WORK
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For information purposes, the Employee&#146;s main place of work is located at 7 boulevard des Ch&ecirc;nes &#150; Parc Ariane &#150; B&acirc;timent Mars &#150; 78280 Guyancourt.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the framework of the execution of her duties, the Employee shall travel in connection with her employment in France and abroad.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Employee hereby agrees to travel in connection with her employment for periods that may (accumulatively but not continuously) exceed
<B>
	three
	months
</B>
	, without constituting a modification of her employment contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	However, it is agreed that, considering the nature of the
	Employee&#146;s activity and the requirements linked with the organization and smooth running of the Company, the Company may change the Employee&#146;s work place within the administrative areas (&#147;
<I>
	d&eacute;partements&#148;
</I>
	), of the
	Paris region, subject to a reasonable notice.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	R
<SMALL>
	EMUNERATION
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5.1 Base
	Salary
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In consideration of the performance of her duties, the Employee shall receive an annual salary of a fixed amount of
<B>
	EUR
	290,606.61 gross
</B>
	(the &#147;Base Salary&#148;) paid in 12 (twelve) equal monthly instalments, i.e. a gross monthly base salary of
<B>
	EUR 24,217.22
</B>
	, from which shall be deducted the social security contributions and other contribution
	required by law or the applicable collective bargaining agreements as the case may be.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Employee&#146;s salary is subject to review
	periodically in compliance with policies applicable within the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5.2 Annual Bonus
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In addition to the Base Salary, the Employee shall be entitled to an annual variable remuneration of up to 45% of the annual Base Salary (the &#147;Annual
	Bonus&#148;). The Annual Bonus may exceed 45%, if the Company decides that it is appropriate to increase the payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The bonus is awarded at
	the sole discretion of the Company .
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Employee will also be eligible to be included in the Weight Watchers International (WWI) Stock
	Option Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The awards are subject to the continued employment of the Employee and shall be governed by the Weight
	Watchers International, Inc.&#146;s stock-based incentive compensation plan documents and relevant agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<SMALL>
	NON
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	COMPETE
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	AND
</SMALL>
	N
<SMALL>
	ON
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	SOLLICITATION
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	OF
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	CLIENTS
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Given the extreme sensitivity of the know-how and technical and commercial informations to which the Employee has access in
	the framework of her duties and the extremely competitive nature of the activities of the Company and the other companies belonging to the Weight Watchers Group, the Parties expressly agree on the necessity of the non-compete obligation in order to
	protect the legitimate interests of the Company and the Weight Watchers Group.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Parties agree that as a result of this non-competition
	obligation, as from the expiry of the notice period, and in the event of the termination of the Employees&#146; contract for whatever reasons, the Employee undertakes:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i) Not to carry on any business operating in the following countries
<B>
<I>
	Austria; Australia; Belgium; Denmark; France; Germany; Netherlands; Sweden; Spain; or Switzerland
</I>
</B>
	that competes with the
	following activities: any activities relating to weight loss management through diet and which relates food and nutrition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii) Not to buy or
	hold participations in any Person regardless of their seat of incorporation, which carries on, directly or indirectly, the activities listed under Paragraph (i)&nbsp;proceeding in the countries listed under Paragraph (i)&nbsp;;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iii) Not to perform any research and/or development activities, either for her own account and that of another person including a supplier, customer,
	university, association, in connection with the products and activities referred to in section (i)&nbsp;above; except in the case of a prior and express agreement from the Company or the Weight Watchers Group, which could not, in any case, concern
	such activity for the account of a client.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iv) Nor to act as an independent consultant / trainer / project development / project management
	Engineering / in connection with the products and activities referred to in section (i)&nbsp;above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In addition, the Employee expressly
	undertakes :
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(A) For any product or activity referred to above, not to visit or contact the Company&#146;s clients or to deal with any
	individual or company that was a client or a prospect of the Company or any other company of the Weight Watchers Group and with whom the Employee was in contact at any time during the three years preceding the termination of her employment contract:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(B) not to employ or induce to employ or seek to induce to leave either in her own interest or in the interest of any other Person any
	employee, specialist/expert, manager or key manager who is an employee or corporate officer of the Company or any other company of the Weight Watchers Group.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This clause will be applied for a six (6)&nbsp;-month period as of the last day of work of the Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	By way of remuneration for this non-compete obligation, and subject to the Employee&#146;s complete compliance with her obligation, she shall receive, for the duration of the non-compete obligation, a
	monthly compensation (including corresponding paid leave) in an amount 75% equal to her average gross monthly remuneration calculated over the last 12 months preceding the notification of termination of the contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This monthly compensation shall be subject to the social security contributions and other contributions required by law or the applicable collective
	bargaining agreements, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Employee expressly acknowledges that if she does not comply with such obligation, she risks
	losing the compensation defined above and having to reimburse to the Company the sums paid in relation to the non-compete obligation, regardless the sanctions and penalties set out hereafter.
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In case of breach by the Employee of this non-compete obligation, she shall automatically pay to the Company
	a penalty which is presently fixed at a flat rate equal to the amount of the monthly compensation stated above. This penalty will be due for each breach, without prior notice to cease the competitive activity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The payment of this penalty shall not deprive the Company from its rights to sue the Employee for damages due to the economic and moral harm linked to
	the breach by the Employee of her non-compete obligation or from its rights to seek an injunction against the Employee to cease immediately the competitive activity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	However, the Company shall have the right to waive the non-compete obligation and thus to waive the Employee&#146;s right to the payment of the non-compete compensation, either at any time during the
	execution of the employment relationship, or upon the termination of the employment contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The decision to waive the non-compete
	obligation shall be notified to the Employee by registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt, at the latest upon the date of the effective departure of the Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	R
<SMALL>
	EMAINING
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	TERMS
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	AND
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	CONDITIONS
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>

</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The remaining terms and conditions of the initial employment contract entered into between the Employee and the Company on 6&nbsp;October 2003 which are not amended by this addendum remain unchanged and
	in force.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	G
<SMALL>
	OVERNING
</SMALL>
<SMALL>
	LAW
</SMALL>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The contract as well as the rights and obligations of the Parties which result there from shall be governed by and construed in accordance with French law. In the event of a dispute between the Company
	and the Employee, French jurisdiction shall be competent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<SMALL>

</SMALL>

	The present
	employment contract is drafted in English and French language on which both Parties agree. The English version is made for information purposes only. In case of dispute the French version only shall prevail.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Dear Corinne,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Reference is made in this letter agreement to the (i)&nbsp;Employment Agreement, dated October&nbsp;6, 2003, by and between Weight Watchers France (&#147;WW France&#148;) and you (the &#147;Employment
	Agreement&#148;); (ii)&nbsp;Addendum to the Employment Agreement, dated May&nbsp;1, 2013, by and between WW France and you (the &#147;Addendum&#148; and together with the Employment Agreement, the &#147;Employment Contracts&#148;); and
	(iii)&nbsp;Amended and Restated Continuity Agreement, dated as of September&nbsp;15, 2015, by and between Weight Watchers International, Inc. (&#147;WWI&#148; and together with WW France, the &#147;Company&#148;) and you (the &#147;Continuity
	Agreement&#148;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As we recently discussed, in connection with your entering into the Continuity Agreement, and notwithstanding any terms and
	conditions of the Continuity Agreement or any Other Arrangement (as defined below), you hereby agree that any consideration payable to you, or obligation to provide benefits to you, pursuant to the Continuity Agreement shall be offset in full by any
	amounts payable or benefits provided to you pursuant to the Employment Contracts or any other agreement between you and the Company or any of its affiliates, any plan, program or arrangement of the Company or any of its affiliates, or as provided
	for by statute, regulation or local law in any applicable jurisdiction (collectively, the &#147;Other Arrangements&#148;). In the event any such payment or benefit is first paid or provided to you pursuant to (i)&nbsp;an Other Arrangement, such
	payment or benefit shall offset in full any payment or benefit to be provided under the Continuity Agreement, and (ii)&nbsp;the Continuity Agreement, such obligations under the Other Arrangements will be deemed to have been satisfied in full by the
	corresponding amount paid or benefit provided under the Continuity Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>
<A NAME="D40414DEX1039_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.39
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	EXECUTION VERSION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	THIS AGREEMENT SHALL ONLY CONSTITUTE A BINDING
	AGREEMENT WHEN
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	FULLY SIGNED BY ALL PARTIES AND EXCHANGED BETWEEN THEM.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<U>
	STRATEGIC COLLABORATION AGREEMENT
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This Strategic Collaboration Agreement (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is entered into this 18th day of October, 2015,
	and is by and among, on the one hand, Weight Watchers International Inc., a Virginia corporation, having an address at 675 Avenue of the Americas, 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	TH
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Floor, New York, New York 10010 (&#147;WW&#148;); and Oprah Winfrey, an individual having a mailing address at c/o
	Harpo, Inc. 1041 North Formosa Avenue, West Hollywood, CA 90046 (&#147;OW&#148;)&#148;. Each of WW and OW is referred to herein as a &#147;Party&#148; and, collectively, as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Statement
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, WW is a worldwide business offering services and products to help individuals safely lose weight and maintain a healthy weight;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, WW is the worldwide owner of the trademarks and service marks listed in
<U>
	Exhibit A
</U>
	, annexed hereto and made a
	part hereof, for diet, weight loss and weight maintenance programs, products and services (the &#147;WW Marks&#148;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, OW is an internationally well-known media proprietor, talk show host, actress, producer, and philanthropist, the owner of the OW
	Image (as defined herein),
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, Harpo, Inc., an entity wholly owned by OW, is the owner of the trademarks and service
	marks listed in
<U>
	Exhibit B
</U>
	, annexed hereto and made a part hereof and OW Licensing Company, LLC, an entity wholly owned by OW, is the owner of rights of publicity associated with OW (collectively, said trademarks, service marks and rights of
	publicity are collectively referred to as the &#147;Oprah Marks&#148;), and OW hereunder acts on behalf of Harpo. Inc. and OW Licensing Company, LLC for all matters related to the Oprah Marks;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, immediately prior hereto or simultaneously herewith, the Parties have entered into or are entering into that certain Term Sheet
	for Consulting Stock Option Awards and that certain Share Purchase Agreement, among other related agreements (collectively, the &#147;Other Agreements&#148;), as the case may be, all on the terms and conditions set forth in greater detail in the
	Other Agreements;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	WHEREAS, incident to the Other Agreements, the Parties are entering into this Agreement, pursuant to which
	(i)&nbsp;WW will grant to OW the right to use one or more of the WW Marks, (ii)&nbsp;OW will grant to WW the right to use one or more of the Oprah Marks and the OW Image, and (iii)&nbsp;OW will provide to WW (and its designees, including direct and
	indirect subsidiaries) certain services, and the Parties will collaborate with each other; in each case, all on the terms, conditions and limitations specifically set forth herein;
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage137"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual promises and covenants set forth herein, and
	in the Other Agreements, and for other good and valuable consideration, the exchange and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the Parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Certain Definitions
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;Advertising Channels&#148; means all media, now known or hereinafter devised, including but not limited to, television, radio, print, outdoor, b-roll video,
	Internet, interaction with the press and media, stores and meeting rooms, WW&#146;s websites, third party websites, and public and investor relations, social media platforms (including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, and similar
	media now known or hereinafter developed), in flight, direct to consumer, jumbotrons, sales films, internal, corporate and industrial uses, meetings or events sponsored and/or attended by WW, electronic, digital, mobile, including personal handheld
	devices (e.g., tablets, iPads and similar devices), and consumer and trade print.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;Losses&#148; means losses, claims, causes of action, demands, damages, obligations, penalties, fines, suits, assessments, judgments, liabilities, costs or
	expenses whatsoever (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees, including any incurred in enforcement of any provision of this Agreement).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For the avoidance of doubt, WW shall have the right to use and refer, without OW&#146;s prior approval under this Agreement, to any one or more of the Oprah Marks and
	the OW Image in connection with discharging any of WW&#146;s responsibilities for making any public disclosures, public or governmental filings, and otherwise to comply with any law, rule, regulation or requirement applicable to WW, as WW deems
	reasonably necessary in its public company reporting. Notwithstanding the foregoing, WW shall exercise all reasonable efforts to consult in advance with OW with respect to the use of the Oprah Marks and the OW Image for such public company
	reporting, and to consider in good faith OW&#146;s comments with respect thereto.

	shall consult with WW and provide the services described herein (including making appearances, as described below), and shall consult with WW and participate in developing, planning, executing and enhancing the Weight Watchers Programs and related
	initiatives. In connection therewith, OW (and her designated staff, which shall act on her behalf and subject to all obligations of confidentiality with respect to the Confidential Information hereunder) shall consult and participate in the design,
	creation, planning, execution of creative strategy, development of the Materials and Advertising Channels, and the related execution of the consumer experience in connection with the Weight Watchers Programs.

	however, that the Parties acknowledge that such collaboration is already ongoing with respect to the 2016 Weight Watchers Program, which is intended to launch in December 2015.

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	such as appearing in advertisements and promotions, as OW determines appropriate and as the Parties may mutually agree, subject to OW&#146;s availability, as applicable.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.2.5.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the event that OW (or OW&#146;s designee if such designee shall have been requested by WW) is required to travel in connection with providing the services under this
	Agreement, the Parties will discuss and agree upon, in advance, all travel and accommodations required by OW (or, as applicable, her designee), and the amount of any costs or fees, if any, to be borne by WW in connection therewith. Any and all
	travel plans, costs, fees and responsibilities shall be only as mutually agreed between the Parties. For the avoidance of doubt, any such travel obligations, costs or fees for the same for OW shall be separate and apart from any such travel required
	for participation on WW&#146;s Board.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="10%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.2.6.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	OW shall use all reasonable efforts, in her discretion, to make reference to and be publicly supportive of WW and the Weight Watchers Programs. Any public statements by
	OW regarding diet, weight loss or weight management shall be consistent with any of the Weight Watchers Programs.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	Term
</U>
	.
</FONT>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Initial Term
</U>
	. The term of this Agreement shall commence upon the full execution and exchange of this Agreement, and shall continue for an initial term of five
	(5)&nbsp;years, (the &#147;Initial Term&#148;), unless sooner terminated as provided herein.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Renewal Term
</U>
	. This Agreement shall be automatically renewed and extended, for successive additional periods of one (1)&nbsp;year, each commencing upon the
	expiration of the Initial Term (each a &#147;Renewal Term&#148;, and together, the &#147;Renewal Terms&#148;), until such time as (i)&nbsp;either WW or OW provides the other Party with no less than six (6)&nbsp;months written notice of its intent
	not to extend this Agreement for the next Renewal Term, in which case, this Agreement shall terminate and expire at the end of the Initial Term or the then-current Renewal Term, or (ii)&nbsp;this Agreement is not otherwise sooner terminated in
	accordance with its terms. All terms and conditions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect for the Renewal Terms, if any, unless OW and WW mutually agree otherwise in writing signed by or on behalf of all such Parties and exchanged
	between them. The Initial Term, together with any Renewal Terms, shall constitute the &#147;Term.&#148;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	No Usage after the Term; Run-Off
</U>
	. Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement, it is understood that WW shall have no further right to
	continue to create, use or disseminate Materials incorporating the Oprah Marks or the OW Image; provided, however, that (i)&nbsp;in the event of the expiration of this Agreement pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof, WW shall have the right to
	continue to use and disseminate printed Materials incorporating the Oprah Marks or the OW Image
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage141"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	existing as of such date through all Advertising Channels for the remainder of the then-current calendar year, and (ii)&nbsp;in the event of other termination of this Agreement, WW shall have the
	right to continue to use and disseminate printed Materials incorporating the Oprah Marks or the OW Image existing as of such date through all Advertising Channels for a period that shall be the longer of (a)&nbsp;six (6)&nbsp;months from the date of
	written notice, and (b)&nbsp;from the date of such written notice through the remainder of the then-current calendar year (in each case, the &#147;Run-Off Period&#148;). WW will not create any new printed Materials using the Oprah Marks or the OW
	Image during the Run-Off Period. The Parties confirm that after the expiration or termination of this Agreement, any continued use by third parties of any such Materials that were already disseminated by or on behalf of WW in accordance with this
	Agreement shall not constitute a breach by WW hereunder, however WW shall use good faith efforts to remove and destroy such Materials, subject to any applicable Run-Off Period. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, WW may
	continue to retain in its archival files any materials incorporating one or more of the Oprah Marks and the OW Image, including the Materials, but no further use may be made thereafter without OW&#146;s written approval. Nothing herein shall prevent
	WW from using or re-using, in perpetuity and without limitation, any Materials where the Oprah Marks and OW Image, as applicable, have been removed.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, this Agreement shall automatically terminate and expire in the event of the failure of the Closing Date (as
	such term is defined in the Other Agreements) to occur prior to November&nbsp;18, 2015.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Non-Competition
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Other Products
</U>
	. During the Term of this Agreement, OW agrees not to provide to any person or entity other than WW any right or license to use or otherwise
	exploit the Oprah Marks and the OW Image for or in connection with any weight loss programs or weight maintenance programs other than the Weight Watchers Programs. For purposes of clarity, and as examples only and without limitation, OW shall have
	no restriction of any kind with respect to speeches, seminars, tours, books, television programs, digital information, endorsements, social media, or any other media offerings, activities, or endeavors of any kind, now or hereafter known, which are
	authored or created by OW or under OW&#146;s authority, or which utilize Oprah Marks or the OW Image, with respect to diet, healthy living, spirituality, faith, recipes, cooking, lifestyle, foods and food products provided however that to the extent
	weight loss or weight management is relevant to any such activities, OW may freely address issues of weight loss and weight maintenance, so long as OW does not endorse or advocate for weight loss or weight maintenance approaches other than Weight
	Watchers Programs.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Competitive Restrictions
</U>
	. During the Term of this Agreement, and one (1)&nbsp;year after the expiration or termination of this Agreement,
	neither OW nor its designees, directly or indirectly, (whether individually or as an owner, partner,
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	joint venture, stockholder, employee, broker, agent, principal, trustee, corporate officer, director, licensor, or in any other capacity whatsoever), shall engage in (or induce or solicit any
	third party to engage in), any Weight Management Products other than the Weight Watchers Programs.
</FONT>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	Non-Disparagement; Ownership
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Non-Disparagement
</U>
	. Each Party acknowledges the value and goodwill associated with the other Party&#146;s Marks and agrees that it will use and refer to the other
	Party&#146;s Marks in a manner designed to protect and enhance the reputation and integrity of such Marks and, as applicable, the OW Image. Each Party shall not exercise the rights granted under this Agreement in any manner that would dilute,
	denigrate or otherwise diminish the value, the goodwill or the reputation associated with the other Party&#146;s Marks or, as applicable, the OW Image. No Party will make any statements or comments of a defamatory or disparaging nature to third
	parties regarding the other Party or its officers, directors, personnel, shareholders, services or products. To the extent any rights in and to the either Party&#146;s Marks are deemed to accrue to the other Party, as a matter of law or otherwise,
	each Party hereby assigns any and all such rights in and to the other Party&#146;s Marks, at such time as they may be deemed to accrue, including all related goodwill, to the other Party, as applicable.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Ownership of the WW Marks
</U>
	. OW acknowledges and agrees that WW owns exclusively all of the intellectual property rights and all other right, title and interest in
	and to the WW Marks and the goodwill pertaining thereto, and that all rights, including any ownership interests, accruing from use by OW (or any of its designees) accrues exclusively to WW. OW agrees that it shall not, at any time during the Term of
	this Agreement or after its expiration or termination, contest the validity of WW&#146;s ownership of or ability to control the WW Marks. OW acknowledges and agrees that its right to use the WW Marks derives solely from this Agreement and is limited
	to the uses expressly permitted hereunder, all solely pursuant to and in compliance with this Agreement, and that OW will not obtain any additional right, title or interest in or to any of the WW Marks by reason of its licensed use.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Ownership of the Oprah Marks
</U>
	. WW acknowledges and agrees that OW ( or its related entities) owns exclusively all of the intellectual property rights and all
	other right, title and interest in and to the Oprah Marks and the goodwill pertaining thereto, and that all rights, including any ownership interests, accruing from use by WW (or any of its designees, including direct and indirect subsidiaries)
	accrues exclusively to OW ( or its related entities). WW agrees that it shall not, at any time during the Term of this Agreement or after its expiration or termination, contest the validity of OW&#146;s or its related entities&#146; ownership of or
	ability to control the Oprah Marks. WW acknowledges and agrees that its right to use the Oprah Marks derives solely from this Agreement and is limited to the uses expressly permitted hereunder, all solely pursuant to and in compliance with this
	Agreement, and that WW will not obtain any additional right, title or interest in or to any of the Oprah Marks by reason of its licensed use.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Ownership of Newly Developed Names or Marks
</U>
	. In the event that, as part of the collaboration among the Parties described herein, one or more new names or marks
	is developed (whether or not actually used) (the &#147;New Names&#148;), such New Names shall be owned by and shall be the sole and exclusive property of WW (or its designees, including direct and indirect subsidiaries); and WW shall have the right
	to register and claim the New Names in any manner, in any form and in any country, in its own name; provided, however, that any New Names shall thereupon be added to and included within the definition of WW Marks hereunder (and subject to the
	license to OW hereunder) during the Term. Notwithstanding the foregoing, unless OW shall provide written approval, no use of the Oprah Marks or OW Image, nor any reference to OW indirectly without use of the Oprah Marks or OW Image, may be included
	in any New Names.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Ownership of New Programs
</U>
	. In the event that, as part of the collaboration among the Parties described herein, enhancements are made, new features are added, or
	new plans introduced as Weight Watchers Programs (the &#147;New Programs&#148;), such New Programs shall be owned by and be the sole and exclusive property of WW (or its designees, including direct and indirect subsidiaries); and WW shall have the
	right to register and claim any proprietary protection (including patents, trademarks, copyrights and trade secrets) in the New Programs in its own name (or in the name of its designees, including direct and indirect subsidiaries); provided,
	however, that any New Programs shall be added to and included in the definition of the Weight Watchers Programs hereunder. Notwithstanding the foregoing, unless OW shall provide written approval, no use of the Oprah Marks or OW Image, nor any
	reference to OW indirectly without use of the Oprah Marks or OW Image, may be included in any New Programs.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	5.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Ownership of Materials
</U>
	. Any trademarks, service marks, trade secrets, trade names, copyrights, design rights, patents or similar proprietary
	right that may be created in or in connection with any Materials (including in connection with any New Names or New Programs), or otherwise under this Agreement, shall be the sole property of WW. OW shall do any and all acts reasonably required by
	WW to confirm such ownership by WW and to preserve, maintain, protect and enforce said rights, at WW&#146;s cost. WW shall own, from inception, all Materials, and OW agrees to provide any and all confirmation in writing as reasonably requested by or
	on behalf of WW to confirm such ownership by WW. All Materials that qualify for treatment as &#147;works made for hire&#148; within the meaning of 17 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;101, shall be treated as such for the benefit of WW. To the extent that any
	portion of such Materials is not a work made for hire, OW hereby completely, irrevocably and without reservation assigns to WW, all right, title and interest in and to such portion of the Materials, as well as all related copyright, patent, trade
	secret and other proprietary rights therein. WW shall have the full and unfettered right to secure copyright and trademark registrations in its own name for the Materials and any versions or revisions thereof. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	in the event such Materials, with OW&#146;s written approval, include the Oprah Marks or OW Image, WW shall not hereby claim any right or ownership in any of the Oprah Marks or the OW Image, and
	OW (or its designee) shall own all right, title and interest in the Oprah Marks and the OW Image.
</FONT>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
